_sText:
AIMING TRAINING

CS Single-Player

Map Info ---------- - Map Version: V1.0 - Working Progress: 1 day - simple dev textures - 10 enemys to kill - unlimited ammo, money and health - improved lighting - collect XP in-game and in your brain - learn how to kill in distances quickly - map designed for SINGLE-PLAYER game - join only as CT and let join 10 bots to T - bot-quota set to 10 - you get 50% transparency This map was designed for Single-Player. sv-cheats 1 is enabled on this map, because the map need bot-stop 1. You have to join Counter Terrorist >**ONLY**. Health, Ammo and Money are unlimited. The mission is to kill all 10 Targets. While you kill them you gain XP (1550 XP Max.). Please do not change any values in console! All entities in the map will do the work, you only have to kill the bots. Be sure you have tick Bot join after player before you starting Created Server. You can only use all CT weapons without AK 47, Dual Elites, Krieg 552, D3/AU-1 and IDF Defender. I found the answer... you need only to write in console at start give and behind it weapon ID. The list is below. - give weapon_ak47 //gives AK-47 - give weapon_elite //gives Dual Elites - give weapon_sg552 //gives Krieg 552 (Zooming Rifle) - give weapon_g3sg1 //gives D3/AU-1 (Auto-Sniper) - give weapon_galil //gives IDF Defender (Galil) If you want to get full Money and Ammo, you need to write in console sv_cheats 1 and after that impulse 101. The impulse 101 command is only available on activate cheats, so not really for multiplayer. - impulse 101 //reset all Money and Ammo to full capacity Special Thanks -------------- - TopHATTWaffle - Dev Textures Bug Reports ----------- Please report all bugs on GameBanana Comments page. Changelog --------- To watch all changes pls watch in Updates section. _____________________________________________________________________________

Please leave comments, rate, give feedback and subscribes if you like.
